column5: I am heading up to Lake Restoule at the the end of August with some friends with the goal of catching some nice fish. I have never been their before and was wondering if anyone can help me out with any good spots or tactics.. Interested in catching Pike,Walleye,Bass, and hopefully a musky. ?  If any one could give me anything I would greatly appreciate it and make our trip so much better. Thanks in advance!
